Cipto Hartanto
an HTML + Sass engineer
now in Taipei

[x]

Cipto Hartanto was born in Indonesia and moved to Taipei in March 2012. In 2014, he graduated from National Taipei University with a Master Degree in Interactive Media Design.


He loves photography, traveling, culinary, and teasing Zom-Zom .


He works as a Markup Engineer at LINE. He is into Jade, Sass/SCSS, Vue.js as well as Gulp and Jekyll.
